scripts.install:all: npm run install:gateway && npm run install:services && npm run install:client
scripts.install:services: cd backend/services/auth-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../job-service && npm install && cd ../application-service && npm install && cd ../search-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../admin-service && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:job" "npm run dev:application" "npm run dev:search" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:gateway && npm run test:services
scripts.test:client: cd frontend/client && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'Client tests not configured'
scripts.test:gateway: cd backend/gateway && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'Gateway tests not configured'
scripts.test:auth: cd backend/services/auth-service && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'Auth service tests not configured'
scripts.test:user: cd backend/services/user-service && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'User service tests not configured'
scripts.test:job: cd backend/services/job-service && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'Job service tests not configured'
scripts.test:application: cd backend/services/application-service && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'Application service tests not configured'
scripts.test:search: cd backend/services/search-service && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'Search service tests not configured'
scripts.test:notification: cd backend/services/notification-service && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'Notification service tests not configured'
scripts.test:admin: cd backend/services/admin-service && npm run test 2>/dev/null || echo 'Admin service tests not configured'
scripts.test:services: npm run test:auth && npm run test:user && npm run test:job && npm run test:application && npm run test:search && npm run test:notification && npm run test:admin
scripts.test:all: concurrently "npm run test:client" "npm run test:gateway" "npm run test:services"
